Verb *touch*
*************

Documentation for the touch verb in */cmds/verbs/touch.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``touch <something>``
 |  ``throw <something> with <something>``

 Touch the panel, touch canvas with paintbrush. You can touch things
 as a ghost as well.
